description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories is a PlayStation RPG with card-battling mechanics. Assume the role of the Prince of
Egypt who transcends time in order to thwart a cataclysmic evil.

v1.0.0.description: Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.
v1.0.0.title: Forbidden Memories Archipelago Multiworld support

v1.1.0.description:
Adds "Local Starchip Bias" option.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.
v1.1.0.title: v1.1.0

v2.0.0.description:
Adds Deathlink.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.0.0.title: FM apworld v2.0.0

v2.1.0.description:
Adds new settings:
 * Extra Progressive Duelist items in the item pool
 * Randomize order of duelists unlocked prior to Egypt 2
 * Cards as items in the pool instead of starchips: half of available checks are reserved as card rewards instead

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.1.0.title: FM apworld v2.1.0

v2.1.1.description:
Adds additional file logging.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.1.1.title: FM apworld v2.1.1

v2.1.2.description:
Fixes this message during generation:
>Invalid or missing manifest file for [..]fm.apworld. This apworld will stop working with Archipelago 0.7.0.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.1.2.title: FM apworld v2.1.2

v2.1.3.description:
Fixes the main cause of cards occasionally not being granted from the multiworld in `cards` `item_mode`.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.1.3.title: FM apworld v2.1.3

v2.1.4.description:
Grants cards from the multiworld *only* on the Free Duel menu. This should avoid issues with cards not being granted.

**NOTE:** A consequence of this update is that the player's card collection on the "Build Deck" mode accessed from the Main Menu may not be up-to-date. If this is a concern, access the "Build Deck" mode from within the "Free Duel" screen instead.

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/sg4e/Archipelago/blob/forbidden-memories/worlds/fm/docs/setup_en.md) for how to get started and current limitations in this release.

Auto-tracker available at https://github.com/sg4e/FMArchipelagoTracker
v2.1.4.title: FM apworld v2.1.4
